2113.subject: BUS
2113.descrlong: Focuses on the Federal tax laws for individuals and most small businesses. Analyzes Federal tax form 1040 with its supporting schedules and forms. Teaches students how to make tax-planning decisions for themselves, their families, their businesses, and perhaps, their clients.  Covers legal requirements and ethical dilemmas encountered through tax reporting options. (Offered in Fall, as interest warrants.)
